# Land Transportation Services for St. Lambert - Solicitation Details
## Introduction
The Great Lakes Pilotage Authority (GLPA) is soliciting proposals from qualified bidders for the provision of land transportation services tailored to transferring ships' pilots between designated locations.

## Solicitation Details
### Solicitation Number
* GLPA-1000040

### Request for Proposal (RFP) Title
* Land Transportation Services for St. Lambert

### Tender Closing Date
* 01 March 2024, at 13:30:00

### Important Dates
* Expected contract start date: 20 March 2024
* Expected contract end date: 31 December 2026

### RFP Overview
The GLPA is seeking a reliable and experienced service provider to transport ships' pilots to and from designated points, including:
* St. Lambert Lock (St. Lambert, Québec)
* Lock 4 Beauharnois (Québec)
* Port of Valleyfield (Québec)
* Cornwall (Ontario)

### Tender Evaluation Criteria
* The tender evaluation will consider the bidder's technical merit and price.

### Procurement Method
* Competitive - Open Bidding

### Service Requirements
The service provider must be able to:
* Provide transportation services for ships' pilots using automobiles
* Operate on a reliable and efficient basis
* Maintain a high level of service quality
